data.prayer: Father, convict the 64 believers in Ghardaïa to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ghardaïa, Algeria

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Ghardaïa an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Ghardaïa, Algeria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 93,437 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Ghardaïa. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Berber, Mozabite people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Berber, Mozabite people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Berber, Mozabite people is yours.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ghardaïa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ghardaïa, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ghardaïa, Algeria has a population of 93,500.

We estimate Ghardaïa has 64 people who might know Jesus, 8 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 93,429 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,460 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Ghardaïa
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Ghardaïa
location.people_groups_list: Tuareg, Algerian, Jew, French-speaking, Arab, Iraqi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tuareg, Algerian (136,000), Jew, French-speaking (700), Arab, Iraqi (4,700)
